original_text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
korean_text: 그 나라의 본 자손들은 바깥 어두운 데 쫓겨나 거기서 울며 이를 갈게 되리라

sentences.original_text: But the children of the kingdom
shall be cast out into outer darkness
there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth
